section.title: The XTreeWidget

note.para: This file is currently a test of how widgets documentation should be written. Let's build an outline as we figure out what the structure should be, then do one or two more widgets until we find a structure that works. Then we can start writing them all. A good place to get initial content might be the Introduction chapter of the User Guide.

We should also be careful in how we word things. Some individual elements (like the Export Contents... varlistentry in the variablelist under Right-click menus) might eventually be incorporated by reference in other sections or documents. Some elements might have roles that control whether they're visible in other contexts, e.g. the entire document might be included in the introduction but we might want the Application Programming Interface section hidden there and visible in the Developers' Guide.

section.title: Right-click menus
section.para: Every XTreeWidget can produce a popup menu. The contents of this menu differ from one window to another, but every menu contains the following:

listitem.para: Export the data displayed on the screen into a plain-text, TAB-delimited file. This file may subsequently be imported into a spreadsheet or other office tool.
